name: Ronitrocket's Brick Breaker
description:
Change-log:

v2.3:

Fixed problems with restarting, added an actual brick image, changed speed of powers, and switched out keyboard controls for mouse controls, made bricks slightly bigger

v2.2:

Fixed bugs with resetting the new 2.0 variables

Fixed a bug where pressing enter at the very beginning of the game/level would start the game but on the next level

v2.1:

Changed ball starting position and direction

v2.0 (The Empowered Update!):

Added power-ups and power-downs which increases/decreases size respectively

Fixed a bug where the instructions would show up when you won/lost a game

v1.9:

Fixed a bug where pausing and restarting in a certain way after a game over allowed you to restart the level without losing the bricks you broke

v1.8:

Fixed a bug where pause button reset ball direction

v1.7:

Added instructions and a pause and reset ball button

v1.6:

Added sound

v1.5:

Fixed a bug where the ball would move faster if hit on the outer edges (Y direction speed wasn’t being lowered)

v1.4:

Ball now bounces at four different angles spread equally on the 180 degree spectrum based on if its hit on the outer fourths or inner fourths (inner is a normal bounce, outer is more sideways)

v1.3:

Ball now bounces left or right based on which side of the paddle it hits

v1.2:

Added levels (10)

Easy to change level

v1.1:

Added changeable brick sizes for use in a later update (Bricks also now 8 rows and 7 columns)

v1.0 (Release!):

Welcome to Ronitrocket’s Brick Breaker! This is my very first game and I will keep updating it as needed, and I hope you have fun!

The game has scores, bricks, a ball, and of course, a paddle. I will add more features as well!
